name: Train Station Manager
description:
Come own your very own Train Station! Combine the trains to discovery brand new trains. Once you've discovered trains you will be able to purchase them in the shop. Manage your train station, and combine the trains to increase profits. Increase how much your trains earn by purchasing perks to improve your station.

This is a perfect game for anyone who likes trains!

Features:

- Many un-lockable trains
- Increase your sales by purchasing perks
- Speed up your trains
- Watch your station grow from small to big
- Free to play!
